title: The Stein-Tomas inequality in trace ideals
abstract: The goal of this review is to explain some recent results regarding generalizations of the Stein-Tomas (and Strichartz) inequalities to the context of trace ideals (Schatten spaces).
note:
Lemma 2 and Proposition 3 are new results and do not appear
anywhere else. They have been obtained in collaboration with Mathieu Lewin.
